"The Power of Love" by Huey Lewis and the News: This song represents the strength and resilience that comes with love, which is a crucial aspect of life.
"The Greatest Show on Earth" by P.T. Barnum: This song reminds us to embrace the journey of life and appreciate the wonders that come with it.
"The Best Day of My Life" by American Authors: This song represents the joy and excitement that comes with living life to the fullest and cherishing every moment.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This song symbolizes the strength and determination that comes with overcoming challenges and achieving success.
"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen: This song represents the beauty and complexity of life, with its mix of different musical styles and themes.
